interior.summary: I see myself as mentor who wise advisor who guides others to success. In this situation, as a dramatic sage, thrives on conflict, but... person, this sales territory war is my battleground. i'm here to prove i'm wise advisor who guides others to success, and if i have to cause chaos or pick a fight, so be it—it's for the greater good. i know i tend to struggle with consistency in my commitments, but that's just how you win. Deep down, I adapt flexibly to changing circumstances and I'm passionate about my convictions.
